title: The Curiosity Matrix: 9 Habits of Curious Minds

title: Deliberate doubt: the art of questioning our assumptions
excerpt: Deliberate doubt is the practice of actively questioning our beliefs and assumptions. It is about suspending our certainty and letting go of our preconceived notions in order to explore new ideas and perspectives.
